title: Bast Statue
summaries: The Bast Statue is a furniture item that grants The Bast Defense buff to players in its vicinity, increasing their defense by 5 points. The buff effect can be toggled via wire. The statue can be found in Sandstone Chests in the lower portion of the Underground Desert, or be found as a furniture in Underground Desert Cabins,or in Oasis Crates and Mirage Crates.
The buff is applied to any players standing within a rectangular area of 170×125 tiles centered on the Bast Statue, similar to <linked>Heart Lanterns</linked> and <linked>Campfires</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases defense by 5 when placed nearby
